content: If a tree produces 200 apples per year, how many apples would 50 trees produce in 7 years?

So if one tree produces 200 apples per year, then 50 trees would produce 200 * 50 = 10,000 apples per year. Over 7 years, that would be 10,000 * 7 = 70,000 apples. So, 50 trees would produce 70,000 apples in 7 years.
